result.trip_overview_narrative: Qingdao Amerasia International School (QAIS) offers travel programs that include participation in ISTA festivals worldwide, engaging students in artistic and dramatic activities with peers. The school partners with WildChina Education, a leader in experiential learning travel, emphasizing safety, sustainability, and high-quality excursions.

evidence.quote: QAIS students travel to various ISTA festivals throughout the world to engage with peers while confronting global issues and themes through artistic and dramatic activities...

programs.program_name: Experiential Learning Excursions with WildChina Education

evidence.quote: WildChina Education is an award-winning travel company that curates experiential learning programs for the world’s leading institutions... their variety of high-quality excursions has made them Asia’s oldest and most established leader in experiential and creative educational travel.

unknowns: Specific grade bands for WildChina excursions
Exact destinations of ISTA festivals and WildChina excursions
